item.title: ideaPad
item.description: ideaPad ideaPad for Android ideaPad is an easy-to-use, app that helps you remember your greatest ideas. Quickly save your ideas or to-do’s, Answer sample questions, draw sketches - that’s the magic. It helps you gain momentum on your life goals and ideas. I build the app in August 2014, because i needed a place where i could store my ideas. Hopefully so they won’t get lost in time and i would work on them.
